additionalFeatures: 3.2” Full touch screen with Advanced anti smudge, anti reflective and anti scratch glass; Swype text input for easy and fast message creation; multiple messaging options, including text with threaded messaging for organized, easy-to-follow text; Social Community support, including Facebook and MySpace; Next generation Address book; Visual Voice Mail
description: The Samsung Gem™ maps a route to a smarter mobile experience. By pairing one of the fastest processors in the category with the Android™ platform, the Gem delivers maximum multitasking speed and social networking capabilities to let you explore new territory online. A smart phone at an even smarter price is a real find, so uncover the Gem and discover what’s next.
name: Samsung Gem™
